quizDescription: Test your knowledge of ancient civilizations and their achievements with this history quiz.

questions.question: Which ancient civilization is known for building the pyramids at Giza?
questions.explanation: The ancient Egyptian Empire is famous for constructing the pyramids at Giza, including the Great Pyramid.

questions.question: Which ancient civilization developed the concept of democracy in Athens?
questions.explanation: The Greek civilization, particularly in Athens, contributed to the development of democracy as a form of governance.

questions.question: The ancient Silk Road facilitated trade between which regions?
questions.explanation: The ancient Silk Road was a network of trade routes connecting Asia and Europe, facilitating cultural exchange and commerce.

questions.question: Which ancient civilization was responsible for the construction of the Great Wall of China?
questions.explanation: The Chinese Empire is credited with building the Great Wall of China as a defensive structure.

questions.question: In which ancient city was the Hanging Gardens believed to have been located?
questions.explanation: The Hanging Gardens of Babylon are considered one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, and they were believed to be in Babylon.
